gold.user: Admin user requesting a list of all clients in the specified realm.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of clients with their details.

gold.user: Admin user creating a new client in the specified realm.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates a new client and returns its details.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving details of a specific client by ID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified client.

gold.user: Admin user updating the details of a specific client.
gold.ideal: Successfully updates the client and returns the updated details.

gold.user: Admin user deleting a specific client by ID.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the client and returns a confirmation message.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving the client secret for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Returns the client secret for the specified client.

gold.user: Admin user generating a new client secret for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Successfully generates a new client secret and returns it.

gold.user: Admin user checking if the client secret has been rotated.
gold.ideal: Returns the status of the client secret rotation.

gold.user: Admin user deleting the rotated client secret.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the rotated client secret.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving default client scopes for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of default client scopes.

gold.user: Admin user updating a default client scope for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Successfully updates the default client scope.

gold.user: Admin user deleting a default client scope for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the default client scope.

gold.user: Admin user generating an example access token for testing.
gold.ideal: Returns an example access token.

gold.user: Admin user generating an example ID token for testing.
gold.ideal: Returns an example ID token.

gold.user: Admin user generating example user info for testing.
gold.ideal: Returns example user info.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving protocol mappers for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of protocol mappers.

gold.user: Admin user checking granted scope mappings for a specific role container.
gold.ideal: Returns granted scope mappings.

gold.user: Admin user checking not granted scope mappings for a specific role container.
gold.ideal: Returns not granted scope mappings.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving installation provider details for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Returns installation provider details.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving management permissions for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Returns management permissions.

gold.user: Admin user updating management permissions for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Successfully updates management permissions.

gold.user: Admin user adding nodes to a specific client.
gold.ideal: Successfully adds nodes and returns updated node list.

gold.user: Admin user deleting a specific node from a client.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the node.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving the count of offline sessions for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Returns the count of offline sessions.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving offline sessions for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of offline sessions.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving optional client scopes for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of optional client scopes.

gold.user: Admin user updating an optional client scope for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Successfully updates the optional client scope.

gold.user: Admin user deleting an optional client scope for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the optional client scope.

gold.user: Admin user pushing revocation for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Successfully pushes revocation.

gold.user: Admin user generating a registration access token for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Successfully generates a registration access token.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving the service account user for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Returns the service account user details.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving the session count for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Returns the count of active sessions.

gold.user: Admin user checking available nodes for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of available nodes.

gold.user: Admin user retrieving user sessions for a specific client.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of user sessions.
